message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I know you'd love. I'm offering it to you at a special price of $12,000.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 just doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to be closer to $10,000 to make this worthwhile.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. I'm thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
